review: We love our Fire, however be warned if you are even THINKING about getting rid of Netflix and even cable (we were since everything seems to be on Prime) DON'T DO IT!!!!!! We love Doctor Who and just found out TODAY with NO warning that Doctor Who is no longer included with Prime along with many other BBC shows. Thankfully Netflix signed (for now) and we didn't get rid of it! It's such a shame because we were looking at getting rid of cable all together, but no longer. We didn't buy the other 2 Fires we needed to make the switch and kept our Netflix! Thanks for the heads up Amazon, we normally love you, but the way this was done was ridiculous.
